Translations.Text: Jevha jaminila purnapane tharathara halavile ja'ila
Ani ti apalyata asalele sarva ojhe bahera kadhuna phekela
Manusya mhanu lagela ki hila jhale tari kaya
Tya divasi jamina apala sarva ahavala sadara karila
Yasathi ki tumacya palanakartyane tila tasa adesa dila asela
Tya divasi loka vegavegalya jamati banuna (parata) phiratila yasathi ki tyanna tyanci karme dakhavili javita
Tevha, jyane kana'itakehi satkarma kele asela, to te pahila
Ani jyane kana'itakehi duskarma kele asela, to te pahila
